Title: Cinderella 3: A Twist in Time
Writer: Dan Berendsen (screenplay), Margaret Heidenry (screenplay), Colleen Millea Ventimilia (screenplay), Eddie Guzelian (screenplay), Steve Bencich (additional screenplay material), Ron J. Friedman (additional screenplay material), Robert Reece (additional screenplay material), Evan Spiliotopoulos (additional screenplay material)
Actors: Jennifer Hale, Christopher Daniel Barnes, Susanne Blakeslee, Tress MacNeille
Plot: When Lady Tremaine steals the Fairy Godmother's wand and changes history, it's up to Cinderella and her mouse friends to restore the timeline and reclaim her prince.
